subject: Re: [junit] Fwd: regarding of junit code
msgSnippet: Forgot to copy JUnit mailing list. Must drink tea before posting! :-) On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 12:42 PM, Simon Chappell
messageBody:
Forgot to copy JUnit mailing list. Must drink tea before posting! :-)

On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 12:42 PM, Simon Chappell <
simonpeterchappell@...> wrote:

> I understand that Cactus and JUnit are similar and are both used for
> testing, but the means of operation of Cactus is sufficiently different that
> you will receive better help for the Cactus portion of your question from
> folks at the Cactus project. We will gladly help get your JUnit testing
> going, but I know that I cannot help you with the Cactus side of things.
>
> Here is the link to the Cactus project website. I see that they have
> mailing lists also.
>
> http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/
>
>
> Simon
> (One of the JUnit list moderators)
>
>
> On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 8:20 AM, suneetha k <kokarla@...> wrote:
>
>>
>> hi
>> thax for responding. but cactus and junit are similar, but only
>> deffirerence is cactus framework is server side.
>>
>> could u please tel how to write in junit for that code.
>>
>> please iam very new to junit.
>>
>> thanks
>> suneetha
>>
>>
>>
>> On 4/21/10, Simon Chappell <simonpeterchappell@...> wrote:
>>
>>> If you need help with JUnit, please ask JUnit specific questions. If you
>>> have a problem with Cactus (which I've never really used) then perhaps
>>> the
>>> Cactus support lists or forums would be a better place.
>>>
>>> The JUnit FAQ covers some of the aspects in your question. Please review
>>> it.
>>>
>>> http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm
>>>
>>> Simon
>>> (One of the JUnit list moderators)
>>>
>>>
>>> On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 5:02 AM, suneetha k <kokarla@...> wrote:
>>>
>>> >
>>> >
>>> > hi
>>> >
>>> > This is suneetha. iam new to cactus junit. can u please tel how to
>>> write
>>> > cactus junit for this class.
>>> > my english is not good.but hope u r understanding wht iam saying.
>>> > actually this is deligate class. in this we create a datagram then we
>>> > return
>>> > some string. how to test expected with actual result.
>>> >
>>> > please help me.
>>> >
>>> > public MicrositeDetailsDTO *processBeforeRedirect *(final
>>> > HttpServletRequest
>>> > request,
>>> > final HttpServletResponse response, final MicrositeIntegrationInput
>>> > micrositeIntegrationInputObject)
>>> > throws ProfileDataFetchException {
>>> >
>>> > final String METHOD_NAME = "processBeforeRedirect";
>>> > logger.logMethodStart(METHOD_NAME);
>>> >
>>> > MicrositeDetailsDTO micrositDetailDTO = new MicrositeDetailsDTO();
>>> > String wrpLoginName =
>>> micrositeIntegrationInputObject.getWrpLoginName();
>>> > String partnerName = micrositeIntegrationInputObject.getPartnerName();
>>> > String service = micrositeIntegrationInputObject.getService();
>>> > String redirectUrl =
>>> > micrositeIntegrationInputObject.getMicrositeRedirectURL();
>>> > String data;
>>> >
>>> > if (logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled()) {
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG, METHOD_NAME,
>>> > "partnerName =" + partnerName + "service =" + service);
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > micrositDetailDTO.setPartnerName(partnerName);
>>> > micrositDetailDTO.setService(service);
>>> > micrositDetailDTO.setRedirectURL(redirectUrl);
>>> >
>>> > boolean isRedirectAllowed = false;
>>> > String integrationStatus =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getIntegrationStatus(partnerName);
>>> > Boolean isSSOMicrosite = (Boolean)
>>> >
>>> request.getSession().getAttribute(LoginServiceConstants.IS_SSO_MICROSITE);
>>> >
>>> > micrositDetailDTO.setRedirectRequired(isRedirectAllowed);
>>> >
>>> > data = createDatagram(request,wrpLoginName,partnerName);
>>> >
>>> > //Set the Datagram in the MicrositeDetailsDTO
>>> > micrositDetailDTO.setData(data);
>>> >
>>> > if (logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled()) {
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG, METHOD_NAME,
>>> > "micrositeDetailsDTO =" + micrositDetailDTO);
>>> > }
>>> > logger.logMethodEnd(METHOD_NAME);
>>> >
>>> > return micrositDetailDTO;
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > public String *createDatagram*(HttpServletRequest request,String
>>> > wrpLoginName, String partnerName)
>>> > throws ProfileDataFetchException {
>>> >
>>> > final String METHOD_NAME = "createDatagram(HttpServletRequest
>>> > request,String wrpLoginName, String partnerName)";
>>> > String status =
>>> > request.getParameter(MicrositeIntegrationConstants.STATUS_FIELD);
>>> > logger.logMethodStart(METHOD_NAME);
>>> >
>>> > if (logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled()) {
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG, METHOD_NAME,"partnerName:" +
>>> > partnerName);
>>> > }
>>> > //picking value from userDetailsDTO in session
>>> > UserDetailsDTO userDetailsDTO = (UserDetailsDTO) (request.getSession().
>>> > getAttribute(MicrositeIntegrationConstants.SESSION_KEY_USER_DETAILS));
>>> > wrpLoginName =
>>> >
>>> (userDetailsDTO!=null)?userDetailsDTO.getWrpLoginName():wrpLoginName;//from
>>> > request
>>> > if(logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled()){
>>> >
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG,METHOD_NAME,"wrpLoginName form
>>> > session "+ wrpLoginName);
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Map containing all the mandatory profile fields data.
>>> > HashMap mandatoryProfileFieldsMap = new HashMap();
>>> > //Map containing all the required non-mandatory profile fields data.
>>> > HashMap nonMandatoryProfileFields = new HashMap();
>>> > //Get the mandatory user profile fields from VodafoneUser property set.
>>> > List mandatoryUserProfileList =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getMandatoryFields(partnerName,
>>> > MicrositeIntegrationConstants.PROFILE_VODAFONE_USER_NODE);
>>> > if (null!= mandatoryUserProfileList &&
>>> > !mandatoryUserProfileList.isEmpty()) {
>>> > HashMap fieldsDataMap =
>>> >
>>> getDataForProfileFields(wrpLoginName,UserProfileConstants.USERPROPERTYSET,
>>> > mandatoryUserProfileList);
>>> > if (null != fieldsDataMap) {
>>> > mandatoryProfileFieldsMap.putAll(fieldsDataMap);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Get the mandatory user profile fields from VodafoneUserSubscription
>>> > property set
>>> > List mandatoryUserProfileSubscriptionList =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getMandatoryFields
>>> >
>>> >
>>> (partnerName,MicrositeIntegrationConstants.PROFILE_VODAFONE_USER_SUBSCRIPTION_NODE);
>>> > if (null != mandatoryUserProfileSubscriptionList &&
>>> > !mandatoryUserProfileSubscriptionList.isEmpty()) {
>>> > HashMap fieldsDataMap =
>>> >
>>> >
>>> getDataForProfileFields(wrpLoginName,UserProfileConstants.SUBSCRIPTIONPROPERTYSET,
>>> > mandatoryUserProfileSubscriptionList);
>>> > if (null != fieldsDataMap) {
>>> > mandatoryProfileFieldsMap.putAll(fieldsDataMap);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Get the non-mandatory user profile fields from VodafoneUser property
>>> set
>>> > List nonMandatoryProfileList =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getNonMandatoryFields(partnerName,
>>> > MicrositeIntegrationConstants.PROFILE_VODAFONE_USER_NODE);
>>> > if (null != nonMandatoryProfileList &&
>>> !nonMandatoryProfileList.isEmpty())
>>> > {
>>> > HashMap fieldsDataMap =
>>> >
>>> getDataForProfileFields(wrpLoginName,UserProfileConstants.USERPROPERTYSET,
>>> > nonMandatoryProfileList);
>>> > if (null != fieldsDataMap) {
>>> > nonMandatoryProfileFields.putAll(fieldsDataMap);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Get the non-mandatory user profile fields from
>>> VodafoneUserSubscription
>>> > property set
>>> > List nonMandatoryUserSubscriptionList =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getNonMandatoryFields(partnerName,
>>> > MicrositeIntegrationConstants.PROFILE_VODAFONE_USER_SUBSCRIPTION_NODE);
>>> > if (null != nonMandatoryUserSubscriptionList &&
>>> > !nonMandatoryUserSubscriptionList.isEmpty()) {
>>> > HashMap fieldsDataMap =
>>> > getDataForProfileFields(partnerName,MicrositeIntegrationConstants.
>>> >
>>> PROFILE_VODAFONE_USER_SUBSCRIPTION_NODE,nonMandatoryUserSubscriptionList);
>>> > if(null != fieldsDataMap) {
>>> > nonMandatoryProfileFields.putAll(fieldsDataMap);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Get the session fields.
>>> > List sessionFields =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getMandatoryFields(partnerName,
>>> > MicrositeIntegrationConstants.SESSION);
>>> > if (null != sessionFields && !sessionFields.isEmpty()) {
>>> > HashMap sessionDataHashMap =
>>> > getDataForSessionFields(sessionFields,request);
>>> > if (null != sessionDataHashMap) {
>>> > mandatoryProfileFieldsMap.putAll(sessionDataHashMap);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Get the list of required custom field names.
>>> > List customFieldList =
>>> > MicrositeDetailsXMLReader.getMandatoryFields(partnerName,
>>> > MicrositeIntegrationConstants.CUSTOM_FIELDS);
>>> > if (null != customFieldList && !customFieldList.isEmpty()) {
>>> > HashMap customFields =
>>> > getDataForCustomFields(wrpLoginName,customFieldList);
>>> > if (null != customFields) {
>>> > mandatoryProfileFieldsMap.putAll(customFields);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > //Create the datagram string.
>>> > String datagram =
>>> >
>>> createDatagramString(mandatoryProfileFieldsMap,nonMandatoryProfileFields);
>>> > if(logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled())
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG,METHOD_NAME,
>>> > "Final datagram created is ["+datagram +"]");
>>> > //Encrypt the datagram String
>>> > String encryptedDatagram = encryptDatagram(datagram,partnerName);
>>> > if(logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled())
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG,METHOD_NAME,
>>> > "Final encrypted datagram is ["+encryptedDatagram +"]");
>>> >
>>> >
>>> >
>>> MicrositeDelegate.micrositeDatagramLogging(wrpLoginName,partnerName,encryptedDatagram,request);
>>> >
>>> > logger.logMethodEnd(METHOD_NAME);
>>> > return encryptedDatagram;
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > /**
>>> > *
>>> > * @return
>>> > * @throws ProfileDataFetchException
>>> > */
>>> > private HashMap getDataForCustomFields(String wrpLoginName, List
>>> > customField) throws ProfileDataFetchException {
>>> > final String METHOD_NAME = "getDataForCustomFields";
>>> > logger.logMethodStart(METHOD_NAME);
>>> > HashMap customFieldMap = new HashMap();
>>> > for (Object fieldName : customField) {
>>> > //Get the data for "serviceId" custom field.
>>> >
>>> >
>>> if(MicrositeIntegrationConstants.SERVICEID_FIELD_CONSTANT.equalsIgnoreCase((String)fieldName))
>>> > {
>>> > List serviceIds = getServiceIds(wrpLoginName);
>>> >
>>> >
>>> customFieldMap.put(MicrositeIntegrationConstants.SERVICEID_FIELD_CONSTANT,serviceIds);
>>> > } else if
>>> >
>>> >
>>> (MicrositeIntegrationConstants.DT_FIELD_CONSTANT.equalsIgnoreCase((String)fieldName))
>>> > {
>>> > String dtValue = getCurrentTime();
>>> >
>>> >
>>> customFieldMap.put(MicrositeIntegrationConstants.DT_FIELD_CONSTANT,dtValue);
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> > if(logger.isDebugLoggingEnabled()){
>>> > logger.log(VodafoneLogger.LOGLEVEL_DEBUG,METHOD_NAME,
>>> > "Custom fields required for OneBill as fetched are
>>> > ["+customFieldMap+"]");
>>> > }
>>> > logger.logMethodEnd(METHOD_NAME);
>>> >
>>> > return customFieldMap;
>>> > }
>>> > }
>>> >
>>> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>>> >
>>> >
>>> >
